Articles.Content:
Hey there,

My Name is Sarah I am 25 Years old. I player KSP for 2 Years now and I still love it like on the first day.  

Now I play the game usually with mods like Real Solar System (Although I have to admit I never got any manned Mission beyond the Moon, shame on me). I am also very bad at building aircrafts and after over 3 Months on one Real Solar System Savegame i finally got a Kerbal on the Moon. But i have a huge space station so I got that going for me, which is nice

I hope to get some useful inspirations on building Aircrafts that actually fly and deep space missions in the Forums.

I am also a somewhat mediocre Arma Modder and i hope to use some of that knowledge for KSP.

See you on the forums.

Hello Sarah and welcome to the forum!

There is a large community of enthusiastic players with whom to discuss the game.  There is also a large community of modders to collaborate with and learn from.  Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!
